duties_responsibilities.duty: Set the vision for best-in-class data engineering products and lead teams working on multiple data pipelines.
Lead the definition, implementation, and review of the organization's systems development management framework.
Drive work across the products to strategically align with business outcomes and oversee delivery of applications in the product line.
Collaboratively facilitate and guide data engineering and inter-departmental architectural and technical choices.
Oversee roadmap administration, maintenance and improvements to data infrastructure and data processing pipelines.
Develop organizational policies, standards, and guidelines for methods and tools and lead the development of organizational capabilities for methods and tools.
Lead, develop, and grow a high-performing data engineering team and collaboratively facilitate and guide data engineering and inter-departmental architectural and technical choices.
Accountable for the design, development, and delivery of high-quality, performant, scalable, well-tested, and compliant technical solutions.
Partner with engineers, data scientists, product teams, and business stakeholders to contextualize data and prepare and deliver complex data sets and data models.
Implement and reinforce data engineering best practices and processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field (Master’s degree preferred)
